tips.message: The Digital World exists in Cyberspace on the Network. Like the Earth, it has continents and oceans.
The app that connects the Digital World and the real world is called Digimon Links.
It looks like lots of Digimon are rampaging around now as the Digital World is fragmenting...
You can press and hold a Digimon's icon to check out its info.
You can get a Login Bonus for logging in once a day! Log in every day to get handy items!
Daily Quests and the items they drop are different each day of the week! Don't forget to check them out!
You can get fragments of Mega data in Advent Quests!
Advent Quests are only unlocked for a limited time. Be sure to check them out while they're available!
Each Digimon Tribe has different Resistances. With the right attack attribute, you can do serious damage!
Digimon whose HP has dropped to 0 can be revived in the next round by using DigiStones!
Signature Skills are powerful attacks with strong effects. Use them wisely to gain the upper hand in battle!
Tap on enemy Digimon to switch targets and adapt to the flow of battle!
The color of the target icon indicates the effectiveness of your attack. Check it before attacking!
Stamina is restored by 1 every 3 minutes. Consider the Stamina cost when you tackle Quests!
AP is restored by 1 point every round. Critical attacks restore an extra 1 point!
When battling opponents with high ATK (physical attack), try building a party of Digimon with high DEF (physical defense)!
When battling opponents with high S-ATK (magical attack), try building a party of Digimon with high S-DEF (magical defense)!
If you delete this app, your save data will be erased and you'll have to start all over! Be careful!
DigiStones are useful for lots of things like making Captures or reducing Facility construction time.
I'm Hina, your friendly guide to Digimon Links! I'll always be here to help whenever you need me!
The lower the Awakening level of a Digimon is, the easier it is to Digivolve!
You can combine multiple Megas using Research! Doing Research creates DigiEggs!
Even if two Medals are the same color, they may boost a Digimon's abilities in different ways.
Abilities can be passed on from a Partner Digimon to a Base Digimon through Ability Seeding!
When Enhancing, you may get a Luck boost if the Partner Digimon is from the same Tribe!
When your Luck goes up, it improves your chances of getting a Luck bonus!
If you find yourself struggling in battle, raise the level of your Digimon and try Digivolving them!
Keep an eye on the AP of your opponents! If they've got a lot of AP saved up, watch out!
Review the Legacy Skills of your Digimon to take advantage of the Resistances and Skills of enemy Digimon!
Play through lots of Normal Quests to efficiently raise your levels!
Whichever Digimon you have on your favorited party will appear on your Farm!
Visit your House to see a list of all your Digimon. You can also release Digimon to get Clusters.
You can't harvest more Meat than your storage limit allows. Increase this by upgrading your Warehouse!
You can only build two Facilities or Decor at once. Remember to confirm construction once it's complete!
You can search for Friends by their User Code! You'll make lots of Friends in no time!
You can increase your Digimon's Resistance with a Resistance Upgrade, so snag lots of matching Digimon!
When Enhancing, a higher Partner level means more chance for a Luck boost! A Mega will work for sure!
Looks like we're safe for now...
A state of emergency?! The fragmentation must be affecting things...
Phew! Looks like you managed to stop those rampaging Digimon safely!
The Colosseum isn't open right now. I'll let you know when it's open again!
Make sure to fight VS Battles somewhere with good reception! A dropped connection counts as a loss.
Looks like it isn't open right now. Let's read all about it and make sure you're ready!
Looks like your Digimon are raring to go, too! All right, let's do this!
Just {0} more wins until the next rank! Come on, you can do it!
Wow, there are lots of people here. I wonder what they're like? Think they'll go easy on us? Me, neither.
It's almost closing time! Let's hurry up and battle!
Ouch... Looks like we got a late start. The sooner we join, the better!
You did a great job! Your Digimon are cheering you on with all their hearts, too!
No matter what the results, I'm just so inspired by the bond between you and your Digimon!

Did you find what you were looking for?
Collect a bunch of stuff to exchange!

This item or that item? There are so many, it's hard to decide!
Ooh! Maybe I'll go with this one...

Hmm...
Looks like you can't make an exchange right now. Let's check back again later.
If the Owner's connection is lost, you'll fail the Quest. Always battle somewhere with good reception!
If a member's connection is lost, they can't return to the Quest. The Owner will take over for them.
Looks like the calculations are going great! They're almost done, so please wait just a little longer!

Daily Quests are the best way to get Digivolution fuel!
Gather as much as you can!

It seems like things are pretty quiet today.
Let's train your Digimon with Daily Quests and Normal Quests!

Looks like a Mega Digimon has appeared.
Let's get set up and go gather some fragments!

It seems like the Digital World
is fragmenting all over the
place! Let's go stop those
rampaging Digimon!
